channel.title: Need Someone to Review
channel.description:
Can anybody take a peek at this and make sure the syntax is all correct? It would be placed into 'commands.java' on my PI server with all the other commands.
The idea is that you can unlock and subsequently spawn items as you increase combat levels. So at cb level 39 you could spawn a set of Kratonite.
ALSO:
What would I add to each to make spawning a set cost money? I'd like to make it so each set is increasingly more expensive.
Thanks, and feel free to use this if you wish!
http://pastebin.com/6mwhWAfZ [code]if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("novite")) || (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("tier1") { c.getItems().addItem(15808, 1); //kite c.getItems().addItem(15914, 1); //full helm c.getItems().addItem(15925, 1); //legs c.getItems().addItem(15936, 1); //gaunts c.getItems().addItem(16013, 1); //plate c.getItems().addItem(16196, 1); //skirt c.getItems().addItem(16262, 1); //boots c.getItems().addItem(16024, 1); //long c.getItems().addItem(16035, 1); //rap c.getItems().addItem(15848, 1); //dag if ((Client) this).getCombatLevel() > 1 c.sendMessage("Any players can spawn this set, which requires combat stats of 1. You get a new set every 13 combat levels!"); } if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("bathus")) || (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("tier2") { c.getItems().addItem(15809, 1); //kite c.getItems().addItem(15915, 1); //full helm c.getItems().addItem(15926, 1); //legs c.getItems().addItem(15937, 1); //gaunts c.getItems().addItem(16014, 1); //plate c.getItems().addItem(16197, 1); //skirt c.getItems().addItem(16263, 1); //boots c.getItems().addItem(16025, 1); //long c.getItems().addItem(16036, 1); //rap c.getItems().addItem(15849, 1); //dag if ((Client) this).getCombatLevel() > 13 else if { c.sendMessage("You don't have the proper combat level to spawn this set. (13)"); } c.sendMessage("Enjoy your Tier 2 combat set! Every 13 combat levels you unlock a new tier."); } if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("marmaros")) || (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("tier3") { c.getItems().addItem(15810, 1); //kite c.getItems().addItem(15916, 1); //full helm c.getItems().addItem(15927, 1); //legs c.getItems().addItem(15938, 1); //gaunts c.getItems().addItem(16015, 1); //plate c.getItems().addItem(16198, 1); //skirt c.getItems().addItem(16264, 1); //boots c.getItems().addItem(16026, 1); //long c.getItems().addItem(16037, 1); //rap c.getItems().addItem(15850, 1); //dag if ((Client) this).getCombatLevel() > 26 else if { c.sendMessage("You don't have the proper combat level to spawn this set. (26)"); c.sendMessage("Enjoy your Tier 3 combat set! Every 13 combat levels you unlock a new tier."); } if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("kratonite")) || (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("tier4") { c.getItems().addItem(15811, 1); //kite c.getItems().addItem(15917, 1); //full helm c.getItems().addItem(15928, 1); //legs c.getItems().addItem(15939, 1); //gaunts c.getItems().addItem(16016, 1); //plate c.getItems().addItem(16199, 1); //skirt c.getItems().addItem(16265, 1); //boots c.getItems().addItem(16027, 1); //long c.getItems().addItem(16038, 1); //rap c.getItems().addItem(15851, 1); //dag if ((Client) this).getCombatLevel() > 39 else if { c.sendMessage("You don't have the proper combat level to spawn this set. (39)"); c.sendMessage("Enjoy your Tier 4 combat set! Every 13 combat levels you unlock a new tier."); } if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("fractite")) || (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("tier5") { c.getItems().addItem(15812, 1); //kite c.getItems().addItem(15918, 1); //full helm c.getItems().addItem(15929, 1); //legs c.getItems().addItem(15940, 1); //gaunts c.getItems().addItem(16017, 1); //plate c.getItems().addItem(16200, 1); //skirt c.getItems().addItem(16266, 1); //boots c.getItems().addItem(16028, 1); //long c.getItems().addItem(16039, 1); //rap c.getItems().addItem(15852, 1); //dag if ((Client) this).getCombatLevel() > 52 else if { c.sendMessage("You don't have the proper combat level to spawn this set. (52)"); c.sendMessage("Enjoy your Tier 5 combat set! Every 13 combat levels you unlock a new tier."); } if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("zephyrium")) || (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("tier6") { c.getItems().addItem(15813, 1); //kite c.getItems().addItem(15919, 1); //full helm c.getItems().addItem(15930, 1); //legs c.getItems().addItem(15941, 1); //gaunts c.getItems().addItem(16018, 1); //plate c.getItems().addItem(16201, 1); //skirt c.getItems().addItem(16267, 1); //boots c.getItems().addItem(16029, 1); //long c.getItems().addItem(16040, 1); //rap c.getItems().addItem(15853, 1); //dag if ((Client) this).getCombatLevel() > 65 else if { c.sendMessage("You don't have the proper combat level to spawn this set. (65)"); c.sendMessage("Enjoy your Tier 6 combat set! Every 13 combat levels you unlock a new tier."); } if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("argonite")) || (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("tier7") { c.getItems().addItem(15814, 1); //kite c.getItems().addItem(15920, 1); //full helm c.getItems().addItem(15931, 1); //legs c.getItems().addItem(15942, 1); //gaunts c.getItems().addItem(16019, 1); //plate c.getItems().addItem(16202, 1); //skirt c.getItems().addItem(16268, 1); //boots c.getItems().addItem(16030, 1); //long c.getItems().addItem(16041, 1); //rap c.getItems().addItem(15854, 1); //dag if ((Client) this).getCombatLevel() > 78 else if { c.sendMessage("You don't have the proper combat level to spawn this set. (78)"); c.sendMessage("Enjoy your Tier 7 combat set! Every 13 combat levels you unlock a new tier."); } if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("katagon")) || (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("tier8") { c.getItems().addItem(15815, 1); //kite c.getItems().addItem(15921, 1); //full helm c.getItems().addItem(15932, 1); //legs c.getItems().addItem(15943, 1); //gaunts c.getItems().addItem(16020, 1); //plate c.getItems().addItem(16203, 1); //skirt c.getItems().addItem(16269, 1); //boots c.getItems().addItem(16031, 1); //long c.getItems().addItem(16042, 1); //rap c.getItems().addItem(15855, 1); //dag if ((Client) this).getCombatLevel() > 91 else if { c.sendMessage("You don't have the proper combat level to spawn this set. (91)"); c.sendMessage("Enjoy your Tier 8 combat set! Every 13 combat levels you unlock a new tier."); } if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("gorgonite")) || (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("tier9") { c.getItems().addItem(15816, 1); //kite c.getItems().addItem(15922, 1); //full helm c.getItems().addItem(15933, 1); //legs c.getItems().addItem(15944, 1); //gaunts c.getItems().addItem(16021, 1); //plate c.getItems().addItem(16204, 1); //skirt c.getItems().addItem(16270, 1); //boots c.getItems().addItem(16032, 1); //long c.getItems().addItem(16043, 1); //rap c.getItems().addItem(15856, 1); //dag if ((Client) this).getCombatLevel() > 104 else if { c.sendMessage("You don't have the proper combat level to spawn this set. (104)"); c.sendMessage("Enjoy your Tier 9 combat set! Every 13 combat levels you unlock a new tier."); } if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("promethium")) || (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("tier10") { c.getItems().addItem(15817, 1); //kite c.getItems().addItem(15923, 1); //full helm c.getItems().addItem(15934, 1); //legs c.getItems().addItem(15945, 1); //gaunts c.getItems().addItem(16022, 1); //plate c.getItems().addItem(16205, 1); //skirt c.getItems().addItem(16271, 1); //boots c.getItems().addItem(16033, 1); //long c.getItems().addItem(16044, 1); //rap c.getItems().addItem(15884, 1); //dag if ((Client) this).getCombatLevel() > 117 } else if { c.sendMessage("You don't have the proper combat level to spawn this set. (117)"); c.sendMessage("Enjoy your Tier 10 combat set! Every 13 combat levels you unlock a new tier."); if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("primal")) || (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("tier11") { c.getItems().addItem(15818, 1); //kite c.getItems().addItem(15924, 1); //full helm c.getItems().addItem(15935, 1); //legs c.getItems().addItem(15946, 1); //gaunts c.getItems().addItem(16023, 1); //plate c.getItems().addItem(16206, 1); //skirt c.getItems().addItem(16272, 1); //boots c.getItems().addItem(16034, 1); //long c.getItems().addItem(16045, 1); //rap c.getItems().addItem(15889, 1); //dag if ((Client) this).getCombatLevel() > 130 else if { c.sendMessage("You don't have the proper combat level to spawn this set. (130)"); c.sendMessage("Enjoy your Tier 11 combat set! This set is the ultimate set earned only by the most dedicated players!"); } [/code]
-DC

item.title: Need Someone to Review
item.dc:creator: @gara494 gara494
item.description:
@gara494 wrote:

for the money requirement add this:

oh and edit it like i did:

[code]if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase(“novite”)) || (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase(“tier1”) {
if (c.getCombatLevel() !> 1) {
c.sendMessage(“you must be over level 1 to spawn this!”);
return;
}
if!(c.getItems().hasItem(995, money amount) {
c.sendMessage(“you need 900 gp to buy this”);
return;
}
c.getItems().addItem(15808, 1); //kite
c.getItems().addItem(15914, 1); //full helm
c.getItems().addItem(15925, 1); //legs
c.getItems().addItem(15936, 1); //gaunts
c.getItems().addItem(16013, 1); //plate
c.getItems().addItem(16196, 1); //skirt
c.getItems().addItem(16262, 1); //boots
c.getItems().addItem(16024, 1); //long
c.getItems().addItem(16035, 1); //rap
c.getItems().addItem(15848, 1); //dag

        }[/code]

please note that i am not familiar with your source, so therefore, if you get an error, it is on the hasItem. I’m only guessing it might be that, it might be getItem or w.e method ur source uses to check if you have an item in your inventory

Read full topic
